Fun Fact: Carpenter ants can lift up to seven times their own weight with their teeth!
Most Distinctive Feature: As these ants burrow through wood, they leave behind piles of wood shavings that may lead back to the nest.
Habitat: Near moist, decaying, or hollow wood
Predators: Mammals, amphibians, snakes, lizards, birds, spiders, snails, and other insects.
Name: Carpenter Ant
